dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.description: A short and descriptive title for the dataset. Do not utilize dates in the title but instead add multiple time-specific resources to the dataset in the next stage.

dataset_fields.label: URL
dataset_fields.description: An URL-address which refers to the dataset. The automatically filled option derived from the title is the best option in most cases.

dataset_fields.label: Tags
dataset_fields.description: Keywords or tags through which users are able to find this dataset easily through the search page or other datasets which have the same tag.

dataset_fields.label: Geographical Coverage
dataset_fields.description: Select the municipalities from which the dataset contains data.

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.description: An universal, compact and easy to understand description of the added dataset. Use as confining terms as possible to assist the user to understand what types of data, meters and dimensions the dataset contains.

dataset_fields.label: Links to additional information
dataset_fields.description: Links to additional information concerning the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.description: The organization which owns the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Visibility
dataset_fields.description: Private datasets will only be seen by the logged in users of the dataset's organization. Public datasets will be listed publicly through the search.

dataset_fields.label: Created
dataset_fields.description: The date which will be shown as the publish date for this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Updated
dataset_fields.description: The date which will be shown as the last modified date for this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Update Frequency
dataset_fields.description: A short description of how frequently the dataset will get updated.

dataset_fields.label: Reminder date
dataset_fields.description: A date when a reminder will be sent to a specified email address reminding to check this dataset. The email address can be changed in the CKAN admin config page.

dataset_fields.label: Global ID
dataset_fields.description: An Id that is used in other services, so that this dataset can be matched to dataset in other service.

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.description: A short and descriptive name for the resource.

resource_fields.label: URL
resource_fields.description: A file or url which describes the location of the desired resource file.

resource_fields.label: Size
resource_fields.description: Size of the added resouce file in bytes. Will be automatically filled when the file is uploaded.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.description: File format of the selected resource.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.description: An universal, compact and easy to understand description of the added resource.

resource_fields.label: Position coordinates
resource_fields.description: Coordinates which describe the area which the added resource is associated with.

resource_fields.label: Time series start
resource_fields.description: A moment in time after which the data is relevant.

resource_fields.label: Time series end
resource_fields.description: A moment in time after which the data is no longer relevant.

resource_fields.label: Time Series Precision
resource_fields.description: A string which describes the precision of the entered time series.
